    8:-module(utils_test_SUITE).
    9:
   10:-compile(export_all).
   11:
   12:-include("test_server.hrl").
   13:
   14:init_per_suite(Config) ->
   15:    Config.
   16:
   17:end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   18:    ok.
   19:
   20:init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   21:    Config.
   22:
   23:end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   24:    ok.
   25:
   26:all(doc) ->
   27:    ["Test the various utility functions"];
   28:
   29:all(suite) ->
   30:    [utils].
   31:
   32:utils(doc) ->
   33:    ["Test utility functions"];
   34:utils(suite) ->
   35:    [test_read_all_of_file].
   36:
   37:%% Test cases starts here.
   38:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   39:test_read_all_of_file(doc) ->
   40:    ["Test we can read files"];
   41:test_read_all_of_file(suite) ->
   42:    [];
   43:test_read_all_of_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   44:    ?line {ok, Data} = utils:read_all_of_file(
   45:			 "utils_test_SUITE_data/dummy_file.txt"),
   46:    ?line ExpectedData = "1234567890",
   47:    ?line Data = ExpectedData,
   48:    ok.
